scripts.bootstrap: npm install && cp -n .env.dist .env && (cd api && npm run bootstrap) && (cd next && npm run bootstrap) && (cd ooth && npm run bootstrap) && (cd proxy && npm run bootstrap)
scripts.start:dev-environment: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml up --build db redis
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev" "cd next && npm run dev" "cd ooth && npm run dev" "cd proxy && npm run dev"
